Html:
I would like to try and port SL version to WPF (not everything of course).

Is there a source code for the Silverlight DDD ?

The Silverlight source is included in the D3 source code download.


David

Actually the confusion here is because the 'real' D3 now is on MS website : http://research.microsoft.com/en-us/um/cambridge/groups/science/tools/d3/dynamicdatadisplay.htm

The latest version on the codeplex is 0.2 2010, and on the ms.research : 2.0 2011.

I tried 0.2 in WPF and it works fine. I want 2.0 as well
Unfortunately the version that is on the research website is not available for commercial use and has other restrictions.
